articles.title: DPRK Premier Learns about Farming in South Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Learns about Farming in South Hwanghae Province
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of farming at the Oguk Cooperative Farm in Anak County and the Chujong Cooperative Farm in Paechon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					 The premier acquainted himself with the farming in both counties and greatly encouraged the officials and agricultural workers in the drive to successfully round off the farming this year.
					
					 The consultative meeting held on the spot discussed the issues of winding up the harvesting and threshing in a brief span of time by properly fixing the time for harvesting as required by the Juche method of farming. 
					
					 It underscored the need for the field of agriculture to widely apply various advanced farming methods and agro-scientific and technological achievements helpful to remarkably boosting the yield while using less seeds, manpower and farming materials so as to bring about a surge in the agricultural production.
					
					 He also learned about the production at the Sunchon Limestone Mine and the Songsan Mine.

articles.title: C.C., WPK, DPRK NDC Give Banquet for Participants in 17th Asian Games
articles.content:
C.C., WPK, DPRK NDC Give Banquet for Participants in 17th Asian Games
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK gave a banquet at the Mokran House on Monday in honor of the participants in the 17th Asian Games.
					 Present there on invitation were players, coaches and officials who participated in the games.
					
					  Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam and other senior officials of the party, state and army, chairmen of the associations of the relevant events who participated in the games, senior officials of supporter units, officials concerned and families of players. 
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae in a speech warmly congratulated players and coaches who returned home after proving successful at the games upon the authorization of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The signal successes made by DPRK sportspersons is an event of special mention as they demonstrated before the world the dignity and honor of Songun Korea making a leap forward toward a sports power and an all-people great jubilee which greatly encouraged the army and people who turned out to build a thriving nation in the spirit of creating the Korean speed, the speaker said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's players and coaches won victory after victory in the games and thus fully demonstrated their great abilities as the strongest team, strongest sportspersons in Asia and greatly contributed to promoting national reconciliation and unity and friendship and peace with various countries.
					
					 The players and coaches, who presented such gifts as gold medals to the mother party and who creditably lived up to the expectation of the country and the people who trained and projected them, are, indeed, the admirable sons and daughters of the nation who deserve the praise of the whole country.
					
					 The speaker called for intensifying trainings the way the anti-Japanese guerillas did in Mt. Paektu and thus consolidating the achievements made in the games and more proudly demonstrating the invincible spirit and might of the country by grabbing gold medals at international tournaments for winning Asian and world titles in the future, too.
					
					 A performance was given by artistes of the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe.

articles.title: Delegation of Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Leaves 
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification led by Chairman Ri Tong Je left here Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of Laos, on the occasion of the 69th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 It was conveyed to Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, by Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, on Monday.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at State Academy of Sciences
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected at the State Academy of Sciences on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statues depict smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who projected the scientists and technicians, trusting them as eternal companions of the revolution.
					
					 An unveiling ceremony took place on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Pak To Chun, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, Jo Yon Jun, and Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials, scientists and employees of the academy, officials, persons of merit, shock brigade members who contributed to erecting the statues, working people, youth and students in Unjong District.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by senior officials of the party, state and army and the academy.
					
					 When the statues were unveiled, they shed brilliant rays.
					
					 Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet and in the name of scientists across the country.
					
					 Also laid were floral baskets in the name of the academy and its branches and institutes, power bodies, working people's organizations, institutions, enterprises, factories and farms at all levels and university and schools in Unjong District.
					
					 All the participants paid tribute to the statues in humblest reverence.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, made an unveiling address.
					
					 The erection of the statues at the academy is another great auspicious event in glorifying the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by developing the nation's science and technology and giving a steady continuity to the history of the cause of immortalizing the leaders, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung declared the founding of the academy on December 1, Juche 41 (1952) during the grim Fatherland Liberation War. This was an event to be specially recorded in the history of the development of the Juche-based science and an undying feat he performed for the country's prosperity.
					
					 He authored many works and gave important instructions, clearly indicating the way for developing science and technology. He visited the academy nearly 20 times and led it to fulfil its mission and role as the institution guiding science and technology.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited it more than 10 times, busy as he was leading the Songun revolution. He authored many works and put the country's science and technology onto a high eminence in the new century by providing energetic leadership.
					
					 The speaker called upon all scientists and technicians to give fullest play to their scientific talents and enthusiasm, register signal scientific and technological achievements and thus firmly defend the outpost of socialism and make tangible contributions to building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 The participants were briefed on the statues before going round them.

articles.title: Celebration Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Celebration Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
 Sukchon, October 6 (KCNA) -- Members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers staged a performance "Hurrah for Workers' Party of Korea Resounding Forth from Cooperative Fields under Socialism" at the Yoldusamchon Farm in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province on Monday.
					 The performance was given on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					  They put on the stage such colorful numbers as poem and chorus "It Is October", female solo and chorus "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea", dialogic poem "We Can't Live without Your Care" and male solo "Voice from My Heart".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by founding the Juche-type revolutionary party and developing it into an invincible guide for the Songun revolution.
					
					 Female trio "Land and Peasants" and peasant dance "Hurrah for Workers' Party of Korea Resounding Forth from Cooperative Fields under Socialism" truthfully represented the stirring realities of the country which has turned into a socialist fairyland under the most experienced and tested leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Repertoire included choruses "Glory to Our Great Party" and "We Know Nobody but You". 
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials concerned and members of the union and agricultural workers of the county.

articles.title: 6th National IT Success Exhibition of University Students Opens
articles.content:
6th National IT Success Exhibition of University Students Opens
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The 6th National IT Success Exhibition of University Students opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Monday.
					 At least 1 300 valuable inventions and IT products are on display at the exhibition hall.
					
					 Those successes have been achieved by university and college students across the country through their dynamic drive to push back the frontiers of the latest science and technology.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned and youth league officials and students.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made an opening address.
					
					 The participants looked round the exhibition hall at the end of the ceremony.

articles.title: New Wireless Firing Machine Developed
articles.content:
New Wireless Firing Machine Developed
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- New wireless firing machines have been introduced at collieries and mines in the DPRK, proving effective in raising the blasting efficiency and preventing accidents.
					 The machine, developed by researchers of University of Sciences, consists of transmitter and receiver with a micro-control unit as its kernel.
					
					 It has been already introduced to the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine and other collieries, ensuring blasting efficiency at over 90 percent and raising tunneling speed without any accident.

articles.title: Songi Mushroom Nutritive Solution
articles.content:
Songi Mushroom Nutritive Solution
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Songi mushroom nutritive solution was one of the exhibits highly praised at the 10th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair held on September 22-25.
					 The solution, produced by the Rason Taehung Trading Company, is a natural health food rich in amino acids, unsaturated fatty acids, vitamins, polysaccharides, etc.
					
					 It is good for recovery from fatigue and has tonic effect.
					
					 It also helps lower lipid in blood and treat bronchitis, pharyngitis and digestive diseases.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts U.S. Hypocritical Stand on Anti-Personnel Mines
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts U.S. Hypocritical Stand on Anti-Personnel Mines
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. clarified its stand to stop the production, storage, use and transfer of anti-personnel mines worldwide as required by the basic provisions of the  Convention on Banning the Use of Anti-Personnel Mines called "Ottawa Treaty."
					 However, the U.S. makes the Korean Peninsula an exception as far as its action is concerned.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Monday says that lurking behind this stand of the U.S. is its sinister scenario to label the DPRK an arch criminal harassing the peace and stability on the peninsula and, at the same time, use it as a bridgehead for carrying out its strategy for world domination by stifling the DPRK by force of arms and putting the peninsula under its permanent control.
					
					 After saying yes to the above-said convention which took Washington so long time to do so, it is now busy creating impression that it is concerned for the world peace and security. This gesture, however, can hardly help hide its true colors as a hypocrite.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly concerned for international detente and the world peace and security, it should pull all its war forces out of south Korea, to begin with, and take a measure to totally ban the use of the above-said weapons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo is the precious fruition of noble patriotism of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their firm will for reunification. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 From the very day the country was divided, Kim Il Sung dedicated his all to national reunification, taking to heart more than anyone else the misfortune and pain suffered by the Koreans. He in his historic report made at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in October, Juche 69 (1980) advanced the above-said proposal.
					
					 He in the proposal clarified the nature and nomenclature of a federal state and the mode of organizing and operating it as well as the 10-point administrative policy to be carried out by a reunified state, clearly indicating not only the way for the reunification of the country but the path to be followed by a reunified country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader of the nation as he led all Koreans' struggle to realize the proposal, true to the President's last instructions for national reunification.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary leadership provided by Kim Jong Il day and night, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the country and nation, represented long journeys featured by loyalty and patriotism for carrying out the President's last instructions for national reunification.
					
					 At the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of the Korean nation's movement for reunification he deemed it as the main contents of the inter-Korean declarations to work for reunification in the direction of realizing federal formula. This was the exploit of great national historic significance performed by him.
					
					 The cause of national reunification started and steered by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is now greeting a new landmark phase under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Event Held by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Event Held by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- An event was held by Koreans in Uzbekistan on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the 69th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were Ju Yong Il, chairman of the "Old Man" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, heads of art troupes of overseas Koreans and other compatriots.
					
					 Displayed there was a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting with South Korean "President" Roh Moo Hyun in Pyongyang in October of 2007.
					
					 Also on display were photos of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un giving field guidance to units of the Korean People's Army and different fields of the national economy.
					
					 Displayed there were the full text of the October 4 declaration and photos showing the development of the DPRK.
					
					 Ju Yong Il said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung on Oct. 10, 1945 has developed into a genuine party serving the people, both in name and reality, while invariably preserving its revolutionary nature and a tested and seasoned revolutionary party leading the revolution and construction to victory only under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 If the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration agreed upon by the north and the south of Korea are sincerely implemented, there will be no insurmountable difficulties in the inter-Korean relations and the reunification issue, he noted, calling on all Koreans to make contributions to the reunification of Korea and building of a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of the historic north-south joint declarations, keeping pace with the people in the homeland.
					
					 The event was followed by an art performance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper 
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The October issue of the Romanian newspaper Romania Muncitoare carried the gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction". 
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it is the fundamental principle to be maintained in accomplishing the socialist cause to preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction and indicates the tasks and ways for doing so. 
					
					 The work also calls for preserving the patriotic stand and the principle of national independence in the revolution and construction and indicates tasks and ways for building our own driving force and struggling against imperialism and hegemony.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Peru 
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian committee for celebrating the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK was formed with due ceremony in Lima on September 30. 
					 Present at the ceremony were personages and members of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, Peruvian People's Women Union, Kim Jong Suk Library, Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and other political parties, organizations and institutions. 
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including meeting, round-table talks and film show on the occasion of the above-said holidays in October.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Romania, Norway, Myanmar
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Romania, Norway, Myanmar 
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Romania, Norway and Myanmar on September 30 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th birthday of the WPK. 
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting exploits President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un performed by leading party building. 
					
					 Also displayed there were works of Kim Jong Un and books and photos showing the invincible might of the WPK. 
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said:
					
					 The WPK has victoriously led the socialist cause for 69 years under the guidance of the great leaders. 
					
					 The WPK has developed into an ever-victorious revolutionary party. It is entirely attributable to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 True to the intentions of the preceding leaders, Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, is victoriously leading the WPK and the Korean people despite the unprecedented moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are shining more brilliantly and the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu is dynamically advancing thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar paid highest tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to founding and strengthening the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Serbian Politician
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Serbian Politician
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, made public a statement on October 1 to mark the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th birthday of the WPK. 
					 Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK was a noteworthy event for development of the WPK and accomplishment of socialism and the cause of independence against imperialism, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people for a long time with his outstanding idea and tested leadership. 
					
					 He authored a lot of works giving perfect answers to all problems arising in the party building and activities to lay a strong foundation for the development of the WPK. 
					
					 His theory on party building and leadership exploits serve as a genuine textbook for all progressive parties. 
					
					 The Korean people hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK. 
					
					 The idea of party building and leadership exploits by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are shining brilliantly and the might of the WPK has been strengthened in every way thanks to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK Founding Anniversary Observed by Bulgarian Politician
articles.content:
WPK Founding Anniversary Observed by Bulgarian Politician
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, released a statement on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement noted:
					
					 The founding and development of the WPK would be unthinkable without the glorious revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the energetic revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Il Sung laid a solid foundation for founding the party during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and realized the historic cause of founding the party on the basis of it after the liberation of the country.
					
					 He developed it into a revolutionary vanguard unit, rallied broad masses around the party, defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Korean war and successfully led the Korean people in their efforts for the socialist revolution and construction.
					
					 Kim Jong Il steered the WPK for nearly half a century, carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In the rigorous period when the Soviet Union and socialist countries in East Europe collapsed and the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK reached their height, Kim Jong Il enforced the original Songun politics in all fields and firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and socialism.
					
					 We wish all the party members and other people in the DPRK big successes in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation, rallied close around the WPK.

articles.title: Brazilian Papers Observe DPRK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Brazilian Papers Observe DPRK Founding Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Brazilian papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Jornal da Cidade Industrial de Curitiba in the September 15-20 issue carried portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos of the President and Marshal Kim Jong Un together with articles titled "66th founding anniversary of DPRK", "Appearance of DPRK" and "DPRK, invincible country." 
					
					 The paper in an article captioned "Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK" introduced in detail the exploits performed by him in the liberation of Korea and nation-building to be conveyed to posterity.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who founded the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East on Sept. 9, 1948, wisely led his country and people for several decades at the head of the DPRK, the paper noted, and went on:
					
					 In the Korean war which broke out in less than two years after the DPRK was founded, the DPRK beat back the aggression by the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and honorably protected its sovereignty and dignity under his leadership.
					
					 The DPRK successfully carried out the post-war rehabilitation and construction on debris and socialist construction.
					
					 We pay high tribute to him on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the DPRK which has demonstrated its might as an invincible socialist power.
					
					 The paper also carried photos of the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Monument to Party Founding, etc.
					
					 The 33rd issue of another Brazilian paper Jornal Mercosur allotted its four pages to articles and photos introducing the glorious history of the DPRK.

articles.title: Banquete en honor de participantes en Juegos Asiaticos
articles.content:
Banquete en honor de participantes en Juegos Asiaticos
						
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en la Casa Mokran el banquete ofrecido por el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en honor de los participantes en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					Participaron los jugadores, entrenadores y funcionarios participantes en los juegos.
					
					Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito y los presidentes de las asociaciones por disciplinas participantes en los Juegos Asiaticos, los funcionarios directivos de las entidades de patrocinio, otros funcionarios y los familiares de los jugadores.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae en su discurso felicito, por encargo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, a los jugadores y entrenadores quienes regresaron luego de alcanzar la victoria en los juegos asiaticos.
					
					La victoria de ellos es un evento que demostro la dignidad y el honor de la Corea del Songun que avanza hacia la potencia de deporte y gran jubilo de todo el pueblo que estimulo al ejercito y el pueblo levantados en la construccion de un Estado prospero mediante la creacion de la velocidad de Corea, subrayo y continuo:
					
					Con sucesivas victorias los jugadores y entrenadores manifestaron sin reserva la digna capacidad del equipo mas fuerte de Asia e hicieron gran aporte a promover la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la amistad y la paz con varios paises.
					
					Los jugadores y entrenadores, quienes respondieron con las medallas de oro a la esperanza del partido madre, la patria y el pueblo son los hijos magnificos de la nacion.
					
					Destaco que al avivar mas el espiritu de entrenamiento del Paektu ellos deben consolidar los exitos logrados esta vez y exaltar con las medallas de oro el espiritu y el poderio de la patria en las competencias internacionales por la heguemonia asiatica y mundial.
					
					En el banquete hubo una funcion de los artistas de la Banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae.

articles.title: Tiene lugar conferencia de prensa con jugadores
articles.content:
Tiene lugar conferencia de prensa con jugadores 
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang la conferencia de prensa con los jugadores y entrenadores inclusive las futbolistas, ganadores de medallas de oro en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios de ramas de prensa e informacion en esta capital y los periodistas de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon.
					
					En la ocasion, Kim Pyong Sik, viceministro de Deportes y jefe de la seleccion de la RPDC se refirio a la envergadura de esta cita deportiva y los exitos de nuestros jugadores.
					
					Ra Un Sim, capitana del equipo de futbol femenino, dijo sobre la clave de que su equipo se hizo mas fuerte en Asia:
					
					Eso se debe enteramente a que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un  nos ofrecio el amor y la confianza, lo que nos infundio el coraje y la audacia.
					
					Nos parecia que el Mariscal dirigiera en el terreno nuestros juegos infundiendo el animo y la fuerza para que obtuvieramos la victoria final.
					
					Con este espiritu participamos en los juegos y pudimos vencer a todos los rivales y hacer el parte al Mariscal de victoria y gloria.
					
					El pesista Kim Un Guk y la boxeadora Jang Un Hui dijeron que lograron excelentes exitos  sorprendentes al circulo deportivo de Asia al manifestar plenamente la indoblegable fuerza espiritual sosteniendo con el ardor patriotico el noble proposito del partido.
					
					Y expresaron el agradecimiento al Mariscal quien les ofrecio maxima gloria y felicidad evaluando de alto los exitos de ellos que hicieron tal como son como deportistas de la epoca de Songun.
					
					Los jugadores y entrenadores tomaron la firme decision de manifestar a todo el mundo la dignidad de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il, al ganar muchas medallas de oro en las competencias internacionales.

articles.title: Ciudadanos de Pyongyang acogen a jugadores coreanos a lo largo de calle
articles.content:
Ciudadanos de Pyongyang acogen a jugadores coreanos a lo largo de calle
						
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- La seleccion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea llego el dia 5 por via aerea a esta capital junto con la delegacion del Comite Olimpico de la RPDC tras participar en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					En esta cita deportiva, los deportistas obtuvieron 36 medallas incluidas 11 de oro.
					
					Al llegar el avion al aeropuerto, los habitantes les dieron una calurosa bienvenida.
					
					Figuraban alli Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Ro Tu Chol, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el secretario jefe del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Gil, los generales del Ejercito Popular de Corea Ryom Chol Song, O Kum Chol y Ri Jong Mu, los presidentes de las asociaciones por disciplinas participantes en los Juegos Asiaticos, los funcionarios directivos de las entidades de patrocinio y otros funcionarios.
					
					Tambien los deportistas, trabajadores y  familiares de los jugadores felicitaron los exitos de los jugadores obsequiandoles collares y ramos de flores.
					
					Los deportistas rindieron sublime homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					A lo largo de las avenidas de decenas de ries desde la entrada del barrio Ryonmot hasta la encrucijada de Ryonghung y las avenidas de Kumsong, Chilsongmun y Changjon, los jugadores fueron objeto de calurosa bienvenida  por parte de los ciudadanos de Pyongyang que salieron con banderines nacionales y ramos de flores en sus manos.
					
					Las jugadoras de futbol compartieron la alegria del encuentro con los ciudadanos  capitalinos.
					
					Innumerables jovenes, estudiantes y trabajadores dieron la cordial acogida a las jugadoras que glorificaron la dignidad de la patria con su destacada capacidad de futbol, agitando ramos de flores y bailando con jubilo.
					
					Llego a climax la acogida de las masas cuando llegaron a la avenida cerca de la Estatua de Chollima, la avenida de Changjon y la Plaza Kim Il Sung.
					
					Los jugadores rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar cesto y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la colina Mansu.

articles.title: Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Academia Estatal de Ciencias
articles.content:
Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Academia Estatal de Ciencias 
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 69o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, fueron levantadas las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos en la Academia Estatal de Ciencias. 
					Las estatuas de bronce describen las imagenes generosas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu quienes hicieron incrustar en el emblema del Partido del Trabajo de Corea la pluma junto con el martillo y la hoz y presentaron a los cientificos y tecnicos como eternos acompanantes de la revolucion. 
					
					En la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos, efectuada el dia 6, participaron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Pak To Chun, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, Jo Yon Jun, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios, cientificos y empleados de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, los funcionarios, ameritados y miembros de la brigada que hicieron gran aporte al levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes del municipio de Unjong. 
					
					Los cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito, el Estado y la Academia Estatal de Ciencias quitaron el velo de las estatuas de bronce. 
					
					Al pie de las estatuas fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Seguidamente, quedaron colocados los otros a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC y a nombre de los cientificos de todo el pais. 
					
					Y fueron depositados los cestos de flores a nombre de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, sus filiales e institutos, los organismos del poder, entidades de masas, organos, empresas, fabricas, granjas, institutos superiores y escuelas a todos los niveles del municipio de Unjong. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron el sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos. 
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					El orador dijo que el levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos en la Academia Estatal de Ciencias es un gran jubilo para glorificar generacion tras generacion las indelebles proezas de los grandes hombres acumuladas para el desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas del pais y continuar la historia de la  causa de eternidad de lider. 
					
					Recordo que el primero de diciembre del 41 (1952) de la Era Juche, periodo de la ardua Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Presidente proclamo a todo el mundo la fundacion de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, lo cual fue un acontecimiento especial en la historia de desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas de tipo jucheano y una imborrable proeza para la prosperidad de la patria. 
					
					Continuo que en muchas obras e instrucciones programaticas, el Presidente ilumino el camino para el desarrollo de las ciencias y  tecnicas y visito en cerca de 20 ocasiones la Academia Estatal de Ciencias para que esta entidad cumpliera la mision y el papel como organo directivo de investigacion cientifica. 
					
					Destaco que el Dirigente la visito en mas de 10 ocasiones aunque estaba muy ocupado por la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, publico muchas obras maestras y puso las ciencias y tecnicas del pais a la altura del nuevo siglo con sus nobles instrucciones y energica orientacion. 
					
					Apunto que todos los cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios deben presentar relevantes exitos cientifico-tecnicos manifestando sin reservas sus inteligencias cientificas y pasion para defender con firmeza la linea avanzada de defensa del socialismo y contribuir a la construccion de la patria prospera. 
					
					Los participantes recorrieron las estatuas de bronce tras escuchar las explicaciones.

articles.title: Funcion artistica de trabajadores agricolas
articles.content:
Funcion artistica de trabajadores agricolas
Sukchon, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 17o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del 69o de la fundacion del PTC, tuvo lugar el dia 6 en la Granja de Yoltusamchon del distrito de Sukchon la funcion artistica de los trabajadores agricolas y los miembros de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea "Vivas del Partido del Trabajo repercuten en las llanuras cooperativas socialistas". 
					En la escena de la funcion se presentaron la poesias y coro "Estamos en octubre" y el solo femenino y coro "Viva el Partido del Trabajo de Corea", la poesia en dialogo "No podemos vivir fuera de su regazo", el solo masculino "Voz de mi corazon" y otras piezas. 
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las indelebles proezas del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, fundador del partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano, y del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien desarrollo el PTC como poderoso e invicto orientador de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					El trio femenino "Tierra y campesino", la danza campesina "Vivas del Partido del Trabajo repercuten en las llanuras cooperativas socialistas", etc., los ejecutantes describieron bien el aspecto vigoroso de la patria que se convierte en el paraiso socialista bajo guia mas probada y veterana del PTC. 
					
					Viendo los coros "Gloria a nuestro gran partido" y "No sabemos a nadie sino a Usted" y otras piezas, los espectadores redoblaron la decision de apoyar solo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y concluir satisfactoriamente las faenas agricolas del presente ano significativo. 
					
					Vieron la funcion el presidente del CC de la UTAC, Ri Myong Gil, funcionarios correspondientes, miembros de la UTAC y trabajadores agricolas del distrito de Sukchon.
